```{bash}
INPUT='/gata/mar/cophyhopa/results/2022-05-04/assem2_filter.recode.vcf'
REF='/gata/joiglu/cophyhopa/data/GCA_902810595.1_AWG_v2_genomic.fna'

angsd -vcf-gl $INPUT -anc $REF -doMaf 1 -doMajorMinor 1 -out pop &> pop.mafs.log


```



```{bash}

angsd -vcf-gl $INPUT -doMajorMinor 1 -out pop -doSaf 1 -anc $REF &> pop.saf.idx.log

 ~/bin/angsd/misc/realSFS pop.saf.idx 1> pop.sfs 2> pop.sfs.log

```

```{r}

pop.sfs <- scan('pop.sfs')
barplot(concolor.sfs[1:((length(concolor.sfs) - 1) / 2)],
        main = 'E. concolor', xlab = 'Minor allele count',
        ylab = 'Number of SNPs')

```
